name.baseName: Caustic soda production ; sodium hydroxide ; cradle
烧碱生产 ; 氢氧化钠 ; 摇篮

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Sodium hydroxide, also known as caustic soda, produced in this process is widely used across various industries. It serves as a key chemical in the manufacture of paper and pulp, textiles, drinking water, soaps and detergents, and as a drain cleaner. Moreover, it's utilized in the food industry for cleaning and disinfecting equipment, peeling fruits and vegetables, and in the process of food preparation. In the chemical industry, it is used for pH regulation, as a reagent in the production of various chemical compounds, and in petroleum refining.
在此过程中生产的氢氧化钠（俗称烧碱）被广泛应用于多个行业。它是造纸和纸浆制造、纺织、饮用水、肥皂和洗涤剂生产以及作为管道清洁剂的关键化学品。此外，它在食品工业中用于清洁和消毒设备、剥皮水果和蔬菜以及食品准备过程中。在化学工业中，它用于pH调节、作为各种化合物生产中的试剂，以及石油精炼中。

technology.technologicalApplicability: Sodium hydroxide, also known as caustic soda, produced in this process is widely used across various industries. It serves as a key chemical in the manufacture of paper and pulp, textiles, drinking water, soaps and detergents, and as a drain cleaner. Moreover, it's utilized in the food industry for cleaning and disinfecting equipment, peeling fruits and vegetables, and in the process of food preparation. In the chemical industry, it is used for pH regulation, as a reagent in the production of various chemical compounds, and in petroleum refining.
在此过程中生产的氢氧化钠（俗称烧碱）被广泛应用于多个行业。它是造纸和纸浆制造、纺织、饮用水、肥皂和洗涤剂生产以及作为管道清洁剂的关键化学品。此外，它在食品工业中用于清洁和消毒设备、剥皮水果和蔬菜以及食品准备过程中。在化学工业中，它用于pH调节、作为各种化合物生产中的试剂，以及石油精炼中。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Inventories of energy input and material flow are collected from updated yearbook s, published papers, official reports and databases. The details of the inventory are presented as Table 1. It should be noted that the data for the material transportation assumptions are based on relevant studies, whic h may be slightly different from the actual situation. The life-cycle intensities of each end-use energy type are based on the results of our previous studies.
能源输入和物流的清单来自更新的年鉴、发表的论文、官方报告和数据库。清单的详细信息如表1所示。需要注意的是，材料运输假设的数据基于相关研究，可能与实际情况略有不同。每种最终使用能源类型的生命周期强度基于我们之前研究的结果。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Peng, T., Ou, X., Yan, X. & Wang, G. Life-cycle analysis of energy consumption and GHG emissions of aluminium production in China. in Energy Procedia vol. 158 3937–3943 (2019).
Peng, T., Ou, X., Yan, X. & Wang, G. Life-cycle analysis of energy consumption and GHG emissions of aluminium production in China. in Energy Procedia vol. 158 3937–3943 (2019).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data for Life Cycle Assessment, please pay close attention to the energy input and material flow inventory presented in Table 1. Consider potential deviations between the transportation assumptions used in this data set and actual transportation scenarios. Furthermore, adjustments might be required based on the specific sub-processes and end-use energy types involved in your study. Ensure that your LCA modeling accurately reflects the life-cycle intensities for each energy type based on the parameters presented in this dataset and take into account the results of previous studies highlighted in the dataset for a comprehensive evaluation.

在使用此数据进行生命周期评估时，请仔细参考表1中呈现的能源投入和物料流动清单。考虑此数据集所用运输假设与实际运输情况之间可能存在的偏差。此外，根据您研究涉及的具体子过程和最终使用能源类型，可能需要进行调整。确保您的LCA建模准确反映数据集中呈现的每种能源类型的生命周期强度，并考虑数据集中突出的以往研究结果，以进行全面评估。此外，该过程仅有能源数据，仅作为能源消耗的参考数据，如需使用请根据实际情况补全其它信息。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
